operation.name: insert
operation.sql: insert into dnm_invest_duein_rcd (id, rcd_id, period_index, repay_amt, repay_interest_amt, repay_date, actual_repay_date, is_delay, is_finish, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

operation.name: load
operation.sql: select id, rcd_id, period_index, repay_amt, repay_interest_amt, repay_date, actual_repay_date, is_delay, is_finish, gmt_create, gmt_modified from dnm_invest_duein_rcd where id = ?
